alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 5:45PM MST until September 23 at 6:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 630 PM MST. * At 545 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tumbleweed Park, or near Gilbert, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mesa, Chandler, Gilbert, Sun Lakes, Queen Creek, Chandler Heights, Gilbert City Hall, Tumbleweed Park, Chandler City Hall, San Tan Village Mall, Seville, Freestone Park, Phoenix Mesa Gateway Airport, San Tan Mountain Park and Higley. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 179 and 184. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 160 and 173. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 33 and 50. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
